sentences.sContent: In this world, nothing was undeserving of the French soldiers!
sentences.sContent_eng: In this world, nothing was undeserving of the French soldiers!
sentences.sCn: 这个世界上，没有一样东西是法兰西士兵所不配享有的！

sentences.sContent: When constitution can be amended for reservation for undeserving vote banks, then why can't law be amended to punish such bastrds who is the most brutal of the gang.
sentences.sContent_eng: When constitution can be amended for reservation for undeserving vote banks, then why can't law be amended to punish such bastrds who is the most brutal of the gang.
sentences.sCn: 当宪法都可以被修改来保留那些不值得的投票银行时，为什么就不能修改法律来惩罚这个最最残忍的家伙。

sentences.sContent: AT THE best of times, the self-made rich are usually held up in fiction as shallow, contemptible and undeserving of sympathy even when their wealth leads to misery and ends in ruin.
sentences.sContent_eng: AT THE best of times, the self-made rich are usually held up in fiction as shallow, contemptible and undeserving of sympathy even when their wealth leads to misery and ends in ruin.
sentences.sCn: 最好的时代，小说里白手起家的富人一贯浅薄可鄙，倘若穷困潦倒、破败坍台，也不配得到一丝同情。
